code: import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/admin/Desktop/designwebsite/react-js-app/crudredux/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState=[];export var cartSlice=createSlice({name:'cart',initialState:initialState,reducers:{add:function add(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;var id=payload.id;var find=state.find(function(item){return item.id===id;});if(find){return state.map(function(item){return item.id===id?_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},item),{},{quantity:item.quantity=1}):item;});}else{state.push(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},payload),{},{quantity:1}));}},remove:function remove(state,action){return state.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});},increment:function increment(state,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;return state.map(function(item){return item.id===payload?_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},item),{},{quantity:item.quantity+1}):item;});},decrement:function decrement(state,_ref3){var payload=_ref3.payload;return state.map(function(item){return item.id===payload&&item.quantity>1?_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},item),{},{quantity:item.quantity-1}):item;});},clearcart:function clearcart(state){return state=[];}}});var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,add=_cartSlice$actions.add,remove=_cartSlice$actions.remove,increment=_cartSlice$actions.increment,decrement=_cartSlice$actions.decrement,clearcart=_cartSlice$actions.clearcart;export{add,remove,increment,decrement,clearcart};export default cartSlice.reducer;
